professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in database administration, maintenance management, and constituent affairs. Skilled in improving operational processes, managing vendor communications, and conducting research projects.

key_responsibilities: Managed maintenance system for distributing and assigning work orders for 3 power plants in New England.
Improved and maintained database resulting in process improvements and extended asset life.
Built massive spreadsheets of 800+ assets and parts
detailing each piece of equipment's maintenance
Communicated with 100+ vendors to gather manuals
and spec. sheets for the database and app.
Answered 300+ calls weekly to provide state agency services.
Handled sensitive and confidential client information.
Maintained quality safety standards for children.
Improved systems and managed employees to increase efficiency.
Reduced dish crew completion time and earned company-wide employee of the month award.
